item.title: EBT systems down in multiple states, Michigan Bridge card not working
item.description: EBT ("food stamps") cards are not working in 17 states, including Michigan, on Saturday October 12, 2013. States affected include Alabama, California ("Golden State Advantage"), Georgia, Iowa, Illinois, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Maryland, Michigan ("Bridge Card"), Mississippi, New Jersey, Ohio ("Direction Card"), Oklahoma, Pennsylvania, Texas and Virginia. As of 9:58 p.m., Xerox claims that the system is back online. From an email from Jennifer Wasmer, Xerox PR: Update: Xerox Resolves EBT System Outage.
